name: Heart Attack (itch) (rafaelgdp, gabstche, Pablo Ramon, ctrl richard)

description:
Team:

Gabriel Dias

Pablo Ramon

Rafael Pontes

Yusef Richard

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Just a quick tip: different player names provide unique gameplays! Try some, like: dev, bug, weak, sonic, flash, alien, etc.

This game was made with the Godot Game Engine! :)
